headline: Supriya Menon,  Steven Lesser
abstract: The couple met in 2018 through the dating app Coffee Meets Bagel.
lead_paragraph: Supriya Menon and Steven Joseph Lesser were married Jan. 4 at the Royal Palms, a resort in Scottsdale, Ariz. Michael J. Kennedy, a Universal Life minister, led a ceremony that incorporated both Roman Catholic and Hindu traditions, with Pandit Kiran Kumar Rao taking part.
